description:
Iska is given a new mission to apprehend the Ice Calamity Witch. By accomplishing the mission, Iska will be a step closer to realizing his dream for a peace treaty. When Iska and Alice meet again, they weren`t prepared for what was coming for them.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Encounter: Successor of the Black Steel and the Ice Calamity Witch
Kaikou: Kurogane no Koukei to Koori Wazawai no Majo
Rencontre fortuite : Le successeur de l`acier noir et la Sorcière des glaces funestes
邂逅 -黒鋼の後継と氷禍の魔女-
